description: Some construction firms will return to work and garden centres and hardware stores can reopen.
title: Coronavirus: Ireland begins first phase of easing lockdown rules
title_page: Coronavirus: Ireland begins first phase of easing lockdown rules - BBC News
maintext: Up to four people who are not from the same household will be allowed to meet outdoors while observing the two metres apart rule, but funerals will still be still restricted to a maximum of 10 people.
